Dear Ray:
A quick answer to your letter of the 14th* I gather
that the hiring of a director of research is dependent on
securing Educational Foundation money. This is being
requested. It seems to me that any plans which we make
fo* large scale research projects must be predicated
on the assumption that we will have a director, If we
do not, it seems to me futile to worry about big research
programs.
Best wishes.
Cordially,
